name: Rhythm Reaper
description:
Defeat biblically-accurate angels to harvest souls as the Rhythm Reaper!

Attack in-time with the music to perform combos.
Gamepad is also supported: A and B attack, X and Y dodge

Credits

  • Alex Winestock - 2D Art
  • Bryce Dixon -  AI, Modeling, Rigging, Animation, Mechanic Design, Programming, and Shaders
  • Elgin Ciani - Music, SFX, and Sound Design
  • Shivam Bhatnagar - Level Design and Modeling
